mapper.select:
select
from ac_course_video where ac_video_course_courseid = '${value}' order by ac_video_course_time asc

select
from ac_course_video where ac_video_course_courseid = '${value}' and ac_video_course_parentChapter=0 order by ac_video_course_time asc

select
from ac_course_video where ac_video_course_courseid = '${courseId}' and ac_video_course_parentChapter='${chapterId}' order by ac_video_course_time asc

select
from ac_course_video where ac_video_course_courseid = '${courseId}' and ac_video_course_Chapter='${chapterId}' and ac_video_course_episode='${episodeId}' order by ac_video_course_time asc
